This is just scary. A guy tried to pay down some credit card debt, and apparently...
 
 "They were told, as they moved up the managerial ladder at the call center, that the amount they had sent in was much larger than their normal monthly payment. And if the increase hits a certain percentage higher than that normal payment, Homeland Security has to be notified. And the money doesn't move until the threat alert is lifted."
 
 Please someone tell me this is a joke, and this isn't actually the country I live in! It's bad enough they're spying on us, but freezing our money if we don't match some pattern that we don't even know about?! 
 
 http://www.capitolhillblue.com/blog/2006/03/warning_financial_responsibili.html

post_info.post_title: Financial responsibility can lead to terrorism!
